bropals.lib.simplegame.util

Class AbstractFileManager<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.util.AbstractFileManager<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the object that is being saved, saved as, or opened.

    public abstract class AbstractFileManager<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A structure for implementing open, save, and save as for editors.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        public void save(T saving)
        Saves the object to the current file. If there is no current file, then this is equivalent to called saveAs(saving)
        Parameters:
        saving - the object to save

      • open

        public T open()
        Opens the open dialog to choose what file to open.
        Returns:
        the object that was read from the selected file.

      • saveAs

        public void saveAs(T savingAs)
        Opens the save as dialog to choose what to save the object as.
        Parameters:
        savingAs - the object to save

      • writeTo

        protected abstract void writeTo(java.io.File file,
                                T object)
        Implements the saving side of this AbstractFileManager implementation.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to write.
        file - the file to write the object to.

      • readFrom

        protected abstract T readFrom(java.io.File file)
        Implements the opening side of this AbstractFileManager implementation.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to read the object from.
        Returns:
        the object that was read from the file.
